articles.title: Japanese man acquitted of 1966 murders after 45 years on death row - Reuters
articles.description: A Japanese man said to have spent the world's longest time on death row was acquitted of murder on Thursday, his legal team said, ending his family's search for justice after a wrongful conviction for crimes committed nearly 60 years ago.
